sourcesContent:
import '../Styles/buttons/button.css' import Data from '../Services/Data' import { FaBirthdayCake } from 'react-icons/fa' import { AiFillMedicineBox } from 'react-icons/ai' import { DiGithubAlt } from 'react-icons/di' import '../Styles/components/cards.css' import Slider from 'react-slick' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css' const Text = () => { let settings = { dot: true, infinite:true, speed:500, slidesToShow:1, slidesToScroll:1, cssEase: 'linear' } return(
{Data.map(info => { return

{info.name}

  • {info.year}
  • {info.info}
  • {info.genero}
})}
) } export default Text
